mil5.3.9:2.2: Tam ve naram samanam ahu loke’ti.
mil5.3.9:3.1: Tatrime cattaro dhamma khanti appaharata rativippahanam akincannam.
mil5.3.9:3.3: Yadi, bhante nagasena, asavanam khaya samano hoti, tena hi ‘catubbhi dhammehi samangibhutam, tam ve naram samanam ahu loke’ti yam vacanam, tam miccha.
mil5.3.9:3.4: Yadi catubbhi dhammehi samangibhuto samano hoti, tena hi ‘asavanam khaya samano hoti’ti tampi vacanam miccha, ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.9:4.3: ‘catubbhi dhammehi samangibhutam, tam ve naram samanam ahu loke’ti.
mil5.3.9:4.4: Tadidam, maharaja, vacanam tesam tesam puggalanam gunavasena bhanitam—
mil5.3.9:4.5: ‘catubbhi dhammehi samangibhutam, tam ve naram samanam ahu loke’ti, idam pana niravasesavacanam ‘asavanam khaya samano hoti’ti.
mil5.3.9:5.1: Api ca, maharaja, ye keci kilesupasamaya patipanna, te sabbe upadayupadaya samano khinasavo aggamakkhayati.
mil5.3.9:5.2: Yatha, maharaja, yani kanici jalajathalajapupphani, vassikam tesam aggamakkhayati, avasesani yani kanici vividhani pupphajatani, sabbani tani pupphaniyeva, upadayupadaya pana vassikamyeva puppham janassa patthitam pihayitam;
mil5.3.9:5.3: evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci kilesupasamaya patipanna, te sabbe upadayupadaya samano khinasavo aggamakkhayati.
mil5.3.9:6.1: Yatha va pana, maharaja, sabbadhannanam sali aggamakkhayati, ya kaci avasesa vividha dhannajatiyo, ta sabba upadayupadaya bhojanani sarirayapanaya, saliyeva tesam aggamakkhayati;
mil5.3.9:6.2: evameva kho, maharaja, ye keci kilesupasamaya patipanna, te sabbe upadayupadaya samano khinasavo aggamakkhayati”ti.
